step.do: Call jquery ajax method and pass object with url, sucess function, error function properties

miscellaneous.head: How to get data for a specific tag
miscellaneous.detail: Call find() method of the returned object and pass the tag name as argument. Returns a colleciton/array or a single object if only one is found

miscellaneous.head: How to get value inside a tag
How to get the tag name
miscellaneous.detail: Use prop() method and pass "nodeName" as argument

miscellaneous.head: How to get child tags
miscellaneous.detail: Use children() method on a JQuery object representing the parent tag
